data.name: Rabbit Hole Demo
data.detailed_description:
PLOT:
Sean Turner came to the small provincial town of Rabbit Hole to see his daughter. When Sean arrives there, he realized that something terrible had happened in that town. There were no people around, but its empty streets were filled with terrible creatures. Now Sean Turner must save his daughter and get out of this hell. But soon he will realize that there is more in this than meets the eye, and the evil he is fighting with has entered our world for a reason.

ABOUT THE GAME:
The deeper Sean dives into this mysterious adventure, the more shocking circumstances arise. Sean learns the terrible secrets that the townspeople hid behind the walls of their homes. You’ll visit numerous atmospheric locations, solve varied puzzles and most importantly have to survive the attacks of a myriad of dangerous creatures. The plot unfolds rapidly and immerses you in a complex and supernatural story written in all the best traditions of the Survival Horror genre.



GAME FEATURES:
  • A Mysterious thriller with a gripping plot.
  • A large atmospheric town with explorable buildings.
  • Alluring graphics and detailed locations.
  • Varied monsters that react to you based on sight and sound.
  • Multiple viable approaches to combat: fight directly or take a stealthy approach.
  • Numerous mysteries and conundrums to solve.

data.short_description: An ancient evil has descended upon the rural town of Rabbit Hole. Now Shaun Turner not only has to untangle a twisted web of supernatural events and mysteries to save his family but also escape from the hellish remains of his hometown.
data.supported_languages:
English, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Russian*, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64bit, 2.6 GHz.
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660 GTX, Radeon HD 7950 or similar
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64bit, 3.0 GHz.
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 980 GTX, Radeon RX 580 or similar

content_descriptors.notes: A horror game with scenes of violence and blood.
